source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: FREE style Watercolor painting how to paint two landscapes.

visible_instructors.title: David Walker
visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor

items.headline: Learn how to paint my 2 stunning watercolor landscapes following easy painting methods and step by step video lessons.
objectives_summary: Produce 2 beautiful landscapes from North Wales,great gifts.

When you have painted the picture along with me for a couple of times,by changing the colors and composition around just a bit you will find you can get your own results and go on to make your own watercolor paintings in future
you will be able to frame and hang these 2 watercolors in your own home

items.title: Create Visual Presentations that bring the WOW!

visible_instructors.name: Jefta
visible_instructors.title: Jefta Bade
visible_instructors.job_title: Connecting people, one visual at the time. High Five!

items.headline: We'll make sure you leave this course being able to visualise a wow experience!
objectives_summary: Create your own Visual that will 'WOW 'people!
A step-by-step approach to create your own visual presentation
Bring your point across effectively

items.title: Learn to make a portrait sculpture out of clay
items.headline: From the making of the frame, through the patterning the sculpture to the casting with gypsum.
objectives_summary: Learn to create a portrait sculpture from clay.
We learn how to make a frame to the sculpture.
We will deal with the human portrait and we will study it closely.

items.title: HOW TO DRAW & SHADE A REALISTIC EAR
items.headline: Making it easy for anyone to draw and shade a realistic ear/Simplified version of drawing
objectives_summary: Master the fundamentals such as: how to see like an artist, construct solid forms, features, anatomy and more
Master the skills to draw a realistic ear without any experience/ without any degree
Master the foundation of realistic drawing

items.title: PanPastel course || Realistic Portrait Painting
items.headline: Learn all the basics and techniques , How to Paint with PanPastel colors , Beginner to advance level .
objectives_summary: - A process to creating a painting from start to finish with panpastel colors in very interesting way .
- Learn panpstel techniques quicker and easier .
- New information that the artist deserves to know about

items.title: Acrylic Painting Ideas

visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor

items.headline: Time To Break The Rules And Paint Some Amazing Art
objectives_summary: Learn to paint expressive artwork with ease!
Discover unconventional acrylic techniques that bend the rules.
Paint awesome florals.

items.title: The Magic of Shading, How to Draw with Value
items.headline: Values Are The Keys To Creating the Illusion of Depth. Anyone Can Do It!
objectives_summary: How to Make Objects Look 3D
Creating the Illusion of Depth
Learn About Shading

items.title: DIY: Epoxy Resin Charcuterie Board [Step by Step Course]
items.headline: Learn how to construct and complete your first very own charcuterie board.
objectives_summary: Charcuterie Board Creation
Epoxy Woodworking

items.title: How To Sew And Bind A Baby Quilt
items.headline: The easy way to "quilt" a blanket
objectives_summary: You will know how to create your own bias tape
You will know how to make a baby blanket/quilt
You will know how to attach bias tap/binding.

items.title: Watercolor for Beginners - Painting Sunsets
items.headline: Fun and Easy Watercolor Practice
objectives_summary: In this class you will find easy to follow step by step videos of painting beautiful sunsets.  Along the way you will:
1. Learn and practice new techniques
2. Apply various watercolor techniques in a painting

items.title: Shimmering colors | Alcohol Ink & Watercolor| Shell Painting
items.headline: Explore pigments and dyes to create some lovely colors with shimmers and sparkle in your alcohol ink and watercolors.
objectives_summary: How create shimmering and sparkling effect with Pigments and dyes using  different mediums
How to create Shimmering colors with alcohol inks and watercolors
How to use a Water-brush pen to create shimmery letters that you can use for your wedding, bridal, or shower invites!

items.title: Pencil Drawing: Basic Techniques to Improve Your Art
items.headline: Learn the Fundamentals of Drawing, From the Line to Still-Life
objectives_summary: Draw a Straight Line
Draw a Near-Perfect Circle
Shade Objects

items.title: Sharpening Chisels and Plane Irons
items.headline: Learn how to sharpen chisels and plane irons in this easy to follow, clear and concise tutorial
objectives_summary: The basic principles of chisel and plane iron sharpening for woodworkers, carpenters and joiners. The course covers theory and practical demonstrations to help you understand the basics so that you can take your wood working to a higher level.

items.title: Red Truck with Lights Acrylic Painting on Canvas - Beginners

visible_instructors.name: Cody
visible_instructors.title: Cody Pettengill
visible_instructors.job_title: New-Age instructor for the modern era of education.

items.headline: Paint a Christmas classic that all households should have! Starting with acrylic paint on canvas, then adding lights.
objectives_summary: Learn to use acrylic paint to paint a canvas, easy beginner instruction
Learn to paint a red truck and tree on a canvas with acrylic paint
Learn to add lights to the canvas for lighted holiday decor

items.title: Six Watercolor Painting Projects For Beginners
items.headline: Improve your watercolor skills through practice
objectives_summary: Watercolor painting techniques
Blending paint wet-in-wet
How to paint landscapes, still-life, flowers

items.title: Learn to Draw with the S-Method – PART 1: Stroke Control
items.headline: Master the foundational techniques for perfect lines and create your first great drawings
objectives_summary: First Drawings - Create your first great line drawings with more than 5 projects and numerous exercises.
Diverse Motifs - You'll find at least one project for each of the most popular motifs in the course: abstract art, landscapes, portraits, animals and architectu
Confident Drawing - Learn to draw confident lines - the foundation of any drawing.
